name: Bunny Band
desc: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. Although it is a mere imitation of the real animal, even the fiercest of Hollow Raiders can relieve stress by petting their bunnies while taking a break, which enhances their combat performance. There are many similar models in this series of W-Engines: a portable bunny, a foldable bunny, a furless bunny... Everyone can find one they will not be able to refuse.
desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. However, it is just an imitation of the real animal.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> when they are shielded.

phase.name: Pet the Bunny
phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>9.2%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> when they are shielded.

phase.desc: Increases Max HP by <color=#2BAD00>10.4%</color>. Increases the equipper's ATK by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> when they are shielded.
